job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve their performance, which falls under improving existing systems and potentially integrating new capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of improving AI models by providing feedback and participating in fine-tuning, which is a core task in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies, even if AI-related, is a software development activity focused on integration and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of different capabilities (human and AI) to deliver a service, which is a form of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on analyzing, improving, and integrating AI systems into customer support workflows. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning and feedback, the core emphasis is on the application and enhancement of existing AI capabilities within a support system, rather than core AI model development or specialized GenAI tasks. The role involves using AI as a tool to augment a software-based support system, fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines tasks related to AI integration and improvement within a support system. While it mentions 'AI model fine-tuning', the overall context points more towards applying and refining AI within a software engineering framework rather than deep AI research or development. The 'What you will NOT be doing' section also provides context about the role's focus. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the term 'fine-tuning' could imply deeper ML work, but the surrounding tasks suggest integration and support.
